articles.author: Laura Kayali
articles.title: Portugal wobbles on buying F-35s because of Trump - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The country’s defense ministry says that the Lockheed Martin F-35s “were not ruled out.”
articles.content:
The ministry added a series of criteria that will be considered by Lisbon, including: "The geopolitical context" and "The extent of restrictions on the use of aircraft."
With the dramatic realignmen… [+1424 chars]
